game.name: God Of This World
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: What if classic RPGs were modern day 3D top-down shooters? You'll collect health, jewels, keys, bullets, shield bombs, unlock doors, destroy enemy portals, all while shooting down non-stop seeker robot enemies with regular and tactical guns, enemies who are all set to fire back.
game.shortDescriptionEn: What if classic RPGs were modern day 3D top-down shooters? You'll collect health, jewels, keys, bullets, shield bombs, unlock doors, destroy enemy portals, all while shooting down non-stop seeker robot enemies with regular and tactical guns, enemies who are all set to fire back.
